sentences: Gilmore Weber III (born May 20, 1963) is an American electric guitar player.
Weber's career with Allin encompassed three USA tours.

Ramone left the band before he even played a live show (although a recording session, featuring both he and a newly released GG, is preserved on film); the remainder of the band composed music for their forthcoming set - later to form the Brutality and Bloodshed for All album, whilst GG composed the lyrics from his prison cell without previously hearing the music.
Weber currently resides in Cincinnati, Ohio.
